  • Constructor Details

    • InterpolationBicubic

      public InterpolationBicubic(int subsampleBits, Range noDataRange, boolean useROIAccessor, double destinationNoData, int dataType, boolean bicubic2Disabled, int precisionBits)
      Simple interpolator object used for Bicubic/Bicubic2 interpolation. On construction it is possible to set a range for no data values that will be considered in the interpolation method.
